- [93mOrganosulfur[0m-[93mRich[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mCarbon[0m [93mCathode[0m [93mEnables[0m [93mSoluble[0m-[93mPolysulfide[0m-[93mFree[0m and [93mHigh[0m-[93mRate[0m [93mPotassium[0m-[93mSulfur[0m [93mBatteries[0m.: [93mPotassium[0m-[93msulfur[0m ([93mK[0m-[93mS[0m) [93mbatteries[0m are [93memerging[0m as [93mone[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mpromising[0m [93mcandidates[0m for [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93menergy[0m [93mstorage[0m, [93mowing[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mhigh[0m [93menergy[0m [93mdensity[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93msevere[0m [93mpolysulfide[0m [93mshuttle[0m [93meffect[0m and [93msluggish[0m [93mredox[0m [93mkinetics[0m of [93msulfur[0m [93mcathodes[0m [93mremain[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mbarriers[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mapplication[0m. [93mHerein[0m, a [93mclass[0m of [93morganosulfur[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mporous[0m [93mcarbon[0m ([93mOSPC[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mdeveloped[0m as a [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mcathode[0m for [93msoluble[0m-[93mpolysulfide[0m-[93mfree[0m and [93mhigh[0m-[93mrate[0m [93mK[0m-[93mS[0m [93mbatteries[0m.
